GK16rajkmimu:3: athātaḥ kāvyaṃ mīmāṃsiṣyāmahe, yathopadideśa śrīkaṇṭhaḥ parameṣṭhivaikuṇṭhādibhyaśtuḥṣaṣṭayoḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:5: teṣu sāgasvateyo vṛndīyasāmapi vandyaḥ kāvyapuruṣa āsīt /
GK16rajkmimu:6: taṃ ca sarvasamayavidaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā bhaviṣyadarthadaśinaṃ bhūrbhuvaḥsvastritayavarttinīṣu prajāsu hatikāmyayā prajāpatiḥ kāvyavidyāpravarttanāyai prāyuṅkta /
GK16rajkmimu:28: itīyaṃ prayojakāṅgavatī saṅkṣipya sarvamarthamalpagranthena aṣṭādaśaprakaraṇī praṇītā /
GK16rajkmimu:53: iyaṃ sā kāvyamīmāṃsā mīmāṃsā yatra vāglavaḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:57: iti rājaśekharakṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ kavirahasye prathame 'dhikaraṇe prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ śāstrasaṅgrahaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:60: śāstranirdeśaḥ iha vāṅmayamubhayathā śāstraṃ kāvyaṃ ca /
GK16rajkmimu:72: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni cārtharvāṇi ta ime catvārobedāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:75: 'śikṣā, kalpo, vyākaraṇaṃ, niruktaṃ, chandovicitiḥ, jyautiṣaṃ ca ṣaḍaṅgāni' ityācāryāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:79: 'dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pariṣasvajāte /
GK16rajkmimu:82: pratyadhikaraṇaṃ ca ṛcaṃ yajuḥ sāmātharvaṇāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ cādāhṛtya bhāṣāmudāhariṣyāmaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:83: tatra varṇānāṃ sthānakaraṇaprayatnādibhiḥ niṣpattinirṇayinī śikṣā āpiśalīyādikā /
GK16rajkmimu:90: pauruṣeyaṃ tu purāṇam, ānvīkṣikī, mīmāṃsā, smṛtitantramiti catvāri śāstrāṇi /
GK16rajkmimu:103: sā ca dvividhā vidhivivecanī brahmanidarśanī ca /
GK16rajkmimu:105: 'tānīmāni caturdaśa vidyāsthānāni, yaduta vedāśratvāraḥ, ṣaḍaṅgāni, catvāri śāstrāṇi' ityācāryāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:108: 'vidyāsthānānāṃ gantumantaṃ na śakto jīvedvarṣaṇāṃ yo 'pi sāgraṃ sahasram /
GK16rajkmimu:113: 'vārttā kāmasūtraṃ śilpaśāstraṃ daṇḍanītiriti pūrvaiḥ sahāṣṭādaśa vidyāsthānāni'ityapare /
GK16rajkmimu:116: daṇḍabhayādvi kṛtsno lokaḥ sveṣu sveṣu karmasvavatiṣṭhate /
GK16rajkmimu:122: ānvīkṣikyā hi vivecitā trayī vārttādaṇḍanītyoḥ prabhavati /
GK16rajkmimu:131: tatra ca tisraḥ kathā bhavanti vādo, jalpo, vitaṇḍā ca /
GK16rajkmimu:140: ye śāstrasamārambhā bhavanti lokasya te vandyāḥ' //
GK16rajkmimu:158: adhyāyādayastvavāntaravicchedāḥ kvatibhiḥ svatantratayā praṇītā ityaparisaṅkhyeyā anākhyeyāśca /
GK16rajkmimu:170: kāvyapuruṣotpattiḥ evaṃ gurubhyo giraḥ puṇyāḥ purāṇīḥ śṛṇumaḥ sma,
GK16rajkmimu:172: kīdṛśaḥ punarasau sārasvateyaḥ kābyapuruṣo vo guruḥ ? iti /
GK16rajkmimu:175: prītena manasā tāṃ viriñcaḥ provāca-'putraṃ te sṛjāmi ' /
GK16rajkmimu:180: tāmāmnāyadṛṣṭacarīmupalabhya bhāṣāviṣaye chandomudrāṃ devī sasaṃmadamaṅkaparyaṅkenādāya tamudalāpayat /
GK16rajkmimu:181: 'vatsa ! sacchandaskāyā giraḥ praṇetaḥ ! vāṅmayamātaramapi mātaraṃ māṃ vicayase /
GK16rajkmimu:183: tvattaḥ pūrve hi vidvāṃso gadyaṃ dadṛśurna padyam /
GK16rajkmimu:191: samaḥ prasanno madhura udāra ojasvī cāsi /
GK16rajkmimu:199: tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho debo martyānāviveśa' //
GK16rajkmimu:201: bālocitaṃ ceṣṭasva' iti nigadya niveśya cainamanokahāśrayiṇī gaṇḍaśailatalatalpe snātumabhragaṅgāṃ jagāmaṃ /
GK16rajkmimu:202: tāvacca kuśān samidhaśca samāhattuṃ niḥsṛto mahāmuniruśanāḥ parivṛtte pūṣaṇyūṣmopaṣlutaṃ tamadrākṣīt /
GK16rajkmimu:204: kṣaṇādāśvastaśca sa sārasvateyastasmai chandasvatīṃ vācaṃ samacārayat /
GK16rajkmimu:207: hṛdi naḥ sannidhattāṃ sā dūktidhenuḥ sarasvatī' //
GK16rajkmimu:213: kāvyaikarupatvācca sārasvateye 'pi kāvyapuruṣa iti bhaktyā prayuñjate /
GK16rajkmimu:214: tataśca vinivṛttā vāgdevī tatra putramapaśyantī madhyehṛdayaṃ cakranda /
GK16rajkmimu:217: sāpi prastutapayodharā putrāyāṅkapālīṃ dadānā śirasi ca cumbantī svastimatā cetasā prācetasāyāpi maharṣaye nibhṛtaṃ sacchandāṃsi vacāṃsi prāyacchate /
GK16rajkmimu:218: anupreṣitaśca sa tayā niṣādanihatasahatasahacarīṃ krauñcayuvarti karuṇakreṅkārayā girā krandantīmudīkṣya śokavān ślokamujjagāda-
GK16rajkmimu:222: yadutānyadanadhīyāno yaḥ prathamamenamadhyeṣyate sa sārasvataḥ kaviḥ saṃpatsyata iti /
GK16rajkmimu:223: sa tu mahāmuniḥ pravṛttavacano rāmāyaṇamidihāsaṃ samadṛbhat ;
GK16rajkmimu:224: dvaipāyanastu ślokaprathamādhyāyī tatprabhāveṇa śatasāhasrīṃ saṃhitāṃ bhāratam /
GK16rajkmimu:225: ekadā tu brahmarṣivṛndārakayoḥ śrutivivāde dākṣiṇyavāndevaḥ svayambhūstāmimāṃ nirṇotrīmuddideśa /
GK16rajkmimu:227: vatsa!parameṣṭhinānanumatasya te na brahmalokayātraghā niḥśreyasāyetyabhidadhānā haṭhānnyavartayadenamātmanā tu pravartate /
GK16rajkmimu:229: priyaṃ mitramasya ca kumāraḥ sākrandaṃ rudannabhyadhīyata gauryā tāta! tūṣṇīmāḥsva sāhameṣā niṣedhāmītinigadandī samacintayat /
GK16rajkmimu:231: tadetasyavaśīkaraṇaṃ kāmapi striyaṃ sṛjāmīti vicintayantī sāhityavidyāvadhūmrudapādayadādiśañcaināmeṣa te ruṣā dharmapatiḥ puraḥ pratiṣṭhate tadanuvarttasvainaṃ nivarttaya ca /
GK16rajkmimu:232: bhavanto 'pi hanta! munayaḥ!kāvyavidyāsnātakāścaritametayoḥ studhvametaddhi vaḥ kāvyasarvasvaṃ bhaviṣyatītyabhidhāya bhagavatī bhavānī joṣamāsiṣṭa /
GK16rajkmimu:234: atha sarve prathamaṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ śiśriyuryatrāṅgavaṅgasuhnabrahmapuṇḍrādyā janapadā;,
GK16rajkmimu:241: yadṛcchayāpi yādṛṅnepathyaḥ sa sārasvateya āsīt tadveṣāśca puruṣā babhūvuḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:243: yadaparaṃ nṛttavādyādikameṣā cakre sā bhārattī vṛttiḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:244: tāṃ te munaya iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:247: tāṃ te munaya iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:256: kiñcidārdramanā yannepathyaḥ sa sārasvateya āsīditi samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:260: tāṃ te munaya iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:263: tāṃ te munaya iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:282: tāmanuraktamanāḥ sa yannepathyaḥ sārasvateya āsīditi samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:285: tāṃ te munaya iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:286: yadatyarthaṃ ca sa tayā vaśaṃvadīkṛtaḥ sthānānuprāsavadasamāsaṃ yogavṛttigarbhaṃ ca (vākyaṃ)
GK16rajkmimu:288: tāṃ te munaya iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:289: tatra veṣavinyāsakramaḥ pravṛttiḥ, vilāsavinyāsakramo vṛttiḥ, vacanavinyāsakramo rītiḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:290: 'catuṣṭayī gatirvṛttīnāṃ pravṛttināṃ ca deśānāṃ punarānantyaṃ tatkathamiva kārtsnyena parigrahaḥ' ityācāryāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:291: anantānapi hi deśāścaturdhaivākalpya kalpayanti 'cakravartikṣetraṃ sāmānyena tadavāntaraviśeṣaiḥ punaranantā eva'iti yāyāvarīyaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:292: dakṣiṇātsamudrādudīcīṃ diśaṃ prati yojanasahasraṃ cakravartikṣetraṃ, tatraiva nepathyavidhiḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:293: tataḥ paraṃ divyādyā api yaṃ deśamadhivaseyustaddeśyaṃ veṣamāśrayanto nibandhanīyāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:297: tatrāsti manojanmano devasya krīḍāvāso vidarbheṣu vatsagulmaṃ nāma nagaram /
GK16rajkmimu:299: tatastadūdhūvaraṃ vinivṛttya teṣu pradeśeṣu viharamāṇaṃ tuṣāragirimevājagāma,
GK16rajkmimu:300: yatra gaurī sarasvatī ca mithaḥ sambandhinyau tasthatuḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:301: tau ca kṛtavandanau dampatīdattvāśiṣaṃ prabhāvamayena vapuṣā kavimānasanivāsinau cakratuḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:303: yatra kāvyamayena śarīreṇa marttyamadhivasanto divyena dehena kavaya ākalpaṃ modante /
GK16rajkmimu:305: evaṃ vibhajya jānānaḥ pretya ceha ca nandati //
GK16rajkmimu:306: iti rājaśekharakṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ kavirahasye prathame 'dhikaraṇe tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ kāvyapuruṣotpattiḥ
GK16rajkmimu:310: yasya nisargataḥ śāstramanudhāvati buddhiḥ sa buddhimān /
GK16rajkmimu:317: tayorbuddhimān śuśrūṣate śṛṇoti gṛhṇīte dhārayati vijānātyūhate 'pohati tattvaṃ cābhiniviśate /
GK16rajkmimu:323: abhainiviśate tasmāttattvaṃ tadekamukhodayaṃ saha paricayo vidyāvṛddhaiḥ kramādamṛtāyate' //
GK16rajkmimu:326: sa khalu sakṛdabhidhānapratipannārthaḥ kavimārgaṃ mṛgayituṃ gurukulamupāsīta /

GK16rajkmimu:331: 'kāvyakarmaṇi kaveḥ samādhiḥ paraṃ vyāpriyate iti śyāmadevaḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:338: sa hi sarvagāmī sarvatra niratiśayaṃ kauśalamādhatte /
GK16rajkmimu:346: apratibhasya padārthasārthaḥ parokṣa iva, pratibhāvataḥ punarapaśyato 'pi pratyakṣa iva /

GK16rajkmimu:351: dhyānaṃ ratnaśilāgṛheṣu vibudhastrīsannidhau saṃyamo yatkāṅkṣanti tapobhiranyamunayastarsmistapasyantyamī //
GK16rajkmimu:361: sā ca dvidhā kārayitrī bhāvayitrī ca /
GK16rajkmimu:367: aihikena kiyatāpi saṃskāreṇa prathamāṃ tāṃ sahajeti vyapadiśanti /
GK16rajkmimu:369: aupadeśikyāḥ punaraihika eva upadeśakālaḥ, aihika eva saṃskārakālaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:370: ta ime trayo 'pi kavayaḥ sārasvataḥ, ābhyāsikaḥ, aupadeśikaśca /
GK16rajkmimu:390: 'ekasya tiṣṭhati kavergṛha eva kāvyam anyasya gacchati suhṛdbhavanāni yāvat /

GK16rajkmimu:394: sā hi kaveḥ śramamabhiprāyaṃ ca bhāvayati /
GK16rajkmimu:396: anyathā so 'vakeśī syāt 'kaḥ punaranayorbhedo yatkavirbhāvayati bhāvakaśca kaviḥ' ityācāryāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:399: bhāvakastu kaviḥ prāyo na bhajatyadhamāṃ daśam //
GK16rajkmimu:404: 'kaścidvācaṃ racayitumalaṃ śrotumevāparastāṃ kalyāṇī te matirubhayathā vismayaṃ nastanoti /
GK16rajkmimu:405: nahyekasminnatiśayavatāṃ sannipāto guṇānām ekaḥ sūte kanakamrupalastatparīkṣākṣamo 'nyaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:411: naisirgikīṃ hi saṃskāraśatenāpi vaṅgamiva kālikāṃ te na jahati /
GK16rajkmimu:412: jñānayonau tu tasyāṃ viśiṣṭajñāyavati vacasi rocakitāvṛttireva' iti yāyāvarīyaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:414: tathāhi-vyutpitsoḥ kautukinaḥ sarvasya sarvatra prathamaṃ sā /
GK16rajkmimu:416: tato bahu tyajati bahu ca gṛhṇāti /
GK16rajkmimu:420: matsariṇastu pratibhātamapi na pratibhātaṃ, paraguṇeṣu vācaṃyamatvāt /
GK16rajkmimu:423: 'kastvaṃ bhoḥ kavirasmi kāpyabhinavā sūktiḥ sakhe paṭhyatāṃ tyaktā kāvyakathaiva samprati mayā kasmādidaṃ śruyatām /
GK16rajkmimu:425: svayaṃ satkaviḥ so 'sminbhāvaka eva nāstyatha bhaveddaivānna nirmatsaraḥ' //
GK16rajkmimu:427: 'śabdānāṃ vivinakti gumphanavidhīnāmodate sūktibhiḥ sāndaṃ leḍhi rasāmṛtaṃ vicinute tātparyamrudrāṃ ca yaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:428: puṇyaiḥ saṅghaṭate vivektṛvirahādantarmukhaṃ tāmyatāṃ keṣāmeva kadācideva sudhiyāṃ kāvyaśramajño janaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:429: svānī mitraṃ ca mantrī ca śiṣyaśyācārya eva ca /
GK16rajkmimu:430: kaverbhavati hī titraṃ kiṃ hi tadyanna bhāvakaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:432: nīyante bhāvakairyasya na nibandhā diśo daśa //
GK16rajkmimu:443: na nisargakaviḥ śāstre na kṣuṇṇaḥ kavate ca yaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:445: kavitvaṃ na sthitaṃ yasya kāvye ca kṛtakaitukaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:448: tadā sa siddho mantavyaḥ, kukaviḥ kavireva vā //
GK16rajkmimu:451: iti rājaśekharakṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ kavirahasye prathame 'dhikaraṇe śiṣyapratibhāvyākhyānaḥ caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
GK16rajkmimu:458: 'prasarati kimapi kathañcana nābhyaste gocare vacaḥ kasya /
GK16rajkmimu:471: itthaṃ krauñcaripoḥ kramādupagate digvāsasaḥ śūlinaḥ praśne vāmakaroparodhasubhagaṃ devyāḥ smitaṃ pātu vaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:478: 'kṛtaḥ kaṇṭhe niṣko nahi kimuta tanvī maṇilatā kṛśaṃ līlāpatraṃ śravasi nihitaṃ kuṇḍalamraci /
GK16rajkmimu:479: na kauśeyaṃ citraṃ vasanamavadātaṃ tu vasitaṃ samāsannībhūte nidhuvanavilāse vanītayā //
GK16rajkmimu:481: na khalu lāvaṇyalābhādṛte rupasampadṛte rupasampado vā lāvaṇyalabdhirmahate saundaryāya /
GK16rajkmimu:491: nahi rājahaṃsaścandrikāpānāya prabhavati, nāpi cakoro 'dbhayaḥ kṣīroddharaṇāya /
GK16rajkmimu:500: yaḥ śāstraṃ vidhatte, yaśca śāstre kāvyaṃ saṃvalidhatte, yo 'pi kāvye śāstrārthaṃ nidhatte /
GK16rajkmimu:515: 'vidyeva puṃso mahimeva rājñaḥ prajñeva vaidyasya dayeva sādhoḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:516: lajjeva śūrasya mṛjeva yūno vibhūṣaṇaṃ tasya nṛpasya saiva' //
GK16rajkmimu:519: santuṣṭuvurmumudire bahu menire ca vācaṃ guroramṛtasambhavalābhagarbhām' //
GK16rajkmimu:522: na cukruśurno rurudurna sasvanurna celurāsurlikhitā iva kṣaṇam' //
GK16rajkmimu:524: 'devī putramasūta nṛtyata gaṇāḥ kiṃ tiṣṭhatetyudbhuje harṣādbhṛṅgiriṭāhṛtagirā cāmuṇḍayāliṅgite /
GK16rajkmimu:528: 'na prātpaṃ viṣamaraṇaṃ prātpaṃ pāpena karmaṇā viṣamaraṇaṃ ca /
GK16rajkmimu:529: na mṛto bhāgīrathyāṃ mṛto 'hamupaguhya mandabhāgī rathyām' //
GK16rajkmimu:535: sphurati ca vadanendurddakpraṇālīnipeyastad iha sudṛśi kalyāḥ kelayo yauvanasya' //
GK16rajkmimu:538: parimlānaprāyāmanuvadati dṛṣṭiḥ kamalinīm itīyaṃ mādhuryaṃ spṛśati ca tanutvaṃ ca bhajate' //
GK16rajkmimu:541: yasyāḥ payāṃsi pariṇāhiṣu hāramūrttyā vāmabhruvāṃ pariṇamanti payodhareṣu' //
GK16rajkmimu:543: 'mūlaṃ bālakavīrudhāṃ surabhayo jātītaruṇāṃ tvacaḥ sāraścandanaśāśināṃ kisalayānyārdrāṇyaśokasya ca /
GK16rajkmimu:544: śairīṣī kusumogdatiḥ pariṇamanmocaṃ ca so 'yaṃ gaṇo grīṣmeṇoṣmaharaḥ purā kila dade dagdhāya pañcaṣave' //
GK16rajkmimu:547: yaṃ vīkṣinte kamapi tamasāṃ jyotiṣāṃ vā parastāt taṃ mohāndhaḥ kathamayamamuṃ vetti devaṃ purāṇam' //
GK16rajkmimu:548: eṣāṃ dvitrairguṇaiḥ kanīyān, pañcakairmadhyamaḥ, sarvaguṇayogī mahākaviḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:550: tatra ca buddhimadāhāryabuddhayoḥ satpa, tistraśca aupadeśikasya /
GK16rajkmimu:559: yaḥ kavitvakāmaḥ kāvyavidyopavidyāgrahaṇāya gurukulānyupāste sa vidyāsnātakaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:560: yo hṛdaya eva kavate nihnute ca sa hṛdayakaviḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:561: yaḥ svamapi kāvyaṃ doṣabhayādanyasyetyapadiśya paṭhati so 'nyāpadeśī /
GK16rajkmimu:563: yo 'navadyaṃ kavate na tu prabadhnāti sa ghaṭamānaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:565: yastu tatra tatragha bhāṣāviśeṣe teṣu teṣu prabandheṣu tasmiṃstasmiṃśca rase svatantraḥ sa kavirājaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:569: yaḥ kanyākumārādiṣu siddhamantraḥ sarasvatīṃ saṅkrāmayati sa saṅkrāmayitā /

GK16rajkmimu:1141: “dvau vajravarṇau jagatīpatīnāṃ sadbhiḥ pradiṣṭau na tu sārvajanyau /

GK16rajkmimu:1171: arthānuśāsanam (arthavyātpiḥ) “sa tridhā” iti drauhiṇiḥ;divyo, divyamānuśaṣo, mānuṣaśca /

GK16rajkmimu:1177: divyasya martyāgamane, martyasya ca svargagamana ityeko bhedaḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:1185: “pāṇḍornandana nandanaṃ vanamidaṃ saṅkalpajaiḥ śīdhubhiḥ kḷtpāpānakakelikalpataruṣu dvandvaiḥ sudhālehinām /
GK16rajkmimu:1186: apyatrenduśilālavālavalayaṃ santānakānāṃ tale jyotsnāsaṃgaladacchanirjharajalairyatnaṃ vinā pūryate” //
GK16rajkmimu:1188: “iti vikasati tasminnanvavāye yadūnāṃ samajani vasudevo devakī yatkalatram /

GK16rajkmimu:1195: eko brūte prathamanihataṃ kaiṭabhaṃ kaṃsamanyaḥ sa tvaṃ tattvaṃ kathaya bhavatā ko hatastatra pūrvam” //
GK16rajkmimu:1197: “mā gāḥ pātālamurvi sphurasi kimaparaṃ pāṭyamānaḥ kudaityata?
GK16rajkmimu:1202: “vadhūḥ śvaśrūsthāne vyavaharati putraḥ pitṛpade pade rikte rikte vinihitapadārthāntaramiti /

GK16rajkmimu:1205: “karkoṭaḥ koṭikṛtvaḥ praṇamati puratastakṣake dehi cakṣuḥ sajjaḥ sevājjaliste kapilakulikayoḥ staiti ca svastikastvāṃ /
GK16rajkmimu:1206: padmaḥ sadmaiṣa bhakteravalagati puraḥ kambalo 'yaṃ balo 'yaṃ sotsarpaḥ sarparājo vrajatu nijagṛhaṃ preṣyatāṃ śaṅkhapālaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1208: “ārdrāvale!vraja na vetsyapakarṇa!karṇaṃ dviḥ sandadhāti na śaraṃ haraśiṣyaśiṣyaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1209: tatsāmprataṃ samiti paśya kutūhalena martyaiḥ śarairapi kirīṭikirīṭamātham” //
GK16rajkmimu:1212: “sa pātu vo yasya śikhāśmakarṇikaṃ svadehanālaṃ phaṇapatrasañcayam /
GK16rajkmimu:1215: “āstīko 'sti muniḥ sma vismayakṛtaḥ pārīkṣitīyānmakhāt trātā takṣakalakṣmaṇaḥ phaṇabhṛtāṃ vaṃśasya śakrasya ca /
GK16rajkmimu:1220: tayoḥ pūrvamāśritāni śāstrāṇi taduttaraṃ kāvyāni” ityaudbhaṭāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1231: yadi tathā syātsūryācandramasormaṇḍale dṛṣṭyā paricchidyamānadvādaśāṅgulapramāṇe purāṇādyāgamaniveditadharāvalayamātre na staḥ iti yāyāvarīyaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1239: kuntu rasavata eva nibandho yukto na nīrasasya” iti āparājitiḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1244: kaviśaktikhyātiphalo vitatadhiyāṃ no mataḥ sa iha” //
GK16rajkmimu:1247: kāvye tu kavivacanāni rasayanti virasayanti ca nārthāḥ,
GK16rajkmimu:1251: yasyāḥ payāṃsi pariṇāhiṣu hāramūrttyā vāmabhruvāṃ pariṇamanti payodhareṣu” //
GK16rajkmimu:1254: yāsu śyāmaniśāsu pītatamaso muktāmayīścandrikāḥ pīyante vivṛtordhdacañcu vicalatkaṇṭhaṃ cakorāṅganāḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1256: “dhatte yatkilakiñcitaikagurutāmeṇīdṛśāṃ vāruṇī vaidhuryaṃ vidadhāti dampatiruṣāṃ yaccandrikārdraṃ nabhaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1257: yacca svargasadāṃ vayaḥ smarasuhṛnnityaṃ sadā sampadāṃ yallakṣmīradhidaivataṃ ca jaladhestatkāntamāceṣṭitam” //
GK16rajkmimu:1261: tataḥ svecchaṃ pūrveṣvasajaditarebhyaḥ pratihataṃ kva hīnaṃ preyasyā hṛdayamidamanyatra ramatām” //
GK16rajkmimu:1263: astu vastuṣu mā vā bhūtkavivāci rasaḥ sthitaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:1264: “yathā tathā vāstu vastuno rupaṃ, vaktaprakṛtiviśeṣāyattā tu rasavattā /
GK16rajkmimu:1265: tathā ca yamarthaṃ raktaḥ stauti taṃ virakto vinindati madhyasthastu tatraghodāste” iti pālyakīrtiḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1266: “yeṣāṃ vallabhayā samaṃ kṣaṇamiva sphārā kṣapā kṣīyate teṣāṃ śītataraḥ śaśī virahiṇāmulkeva santāpakṛt /
GK16rajkmimu:1267: asmākaṃ na tu vallabhā na virahastenobhayabhraṃśinām indū rājati darpaṇākṛtirayaṃ noṣṇo na vā śītalaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1268: “vidagdhabhaṇitibhaṅginivedyaṃ vastuno rupaṃ na niyatasvabhāvam” iti avantisundarī /
GK16rajkmimu:1284: “sā patyuḥ prathamāparādhakaraṇe śikṣopadeśaṃ vinā no janāti savibhramāṅgavalanā vakrokticitrāṃ gatim /
GK16rajkmimu:1285: svacchairacchakapolamūlamūlagalitaiḥ paryastanetrotpalā bālā kevalameva roditi luṭhallolodakairaśrubhiḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1287: “dūrādutsakamāgate vivasitaṃ sambhāṣiṇi sphāritaṃ saṃśliṣyatyaruṇaṃ gṛhītavasane kopāñcitabhrūtalam /
GK16rajkmimu:1288: māninyāścaraṇānativyatikare bāṣpāmbupūrṇāṃ kṣaṇāc cakṣurjātamaho prapañcacaturaṃ jātāgasi preyasi” //
GK16rajkmimu:1290: “dattvā rudbhagatiḥ khasādhipataye devīṃ dhruvasvāminīṃ yasmātkhaṇḍitasāhaso nivavṛte śrīśarmagutpo nṛpaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1291: tasminneva himālaye guruguhākoṇakvaṇatkinnare gīyante tava kārttikeyanagarastrīṇāṃ gaṇaiḥ kīrttayaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1293: “dṛṣṭravaikāsanasaṃsthite priyatame paścādupetyādarād ekasyā nayane nimīlya vihitakrīḍānubandhacchalaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1294: īṣadvakritakandharaḥ sapulakaḥ premollasanmānasām antarhāsalasatkapolaphalakāṃ dhūrto 'parāṃ cumbati” //
GK16rajkmimu:1296: “kuvartyā kuṅkumābhbhaḥ kapiśitavapuṣaṃ yattadā rājahaṃsīṃ krīḍāhaṃśo mayāsāvajāni virahitaścakravākībhrameṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:1297: tasyaitatpāpmano me pariṇamati phalaṃ yatpure premabandhād ekatrāvāṃ vasāvo na ca dayita dṛśāpyasti nau sannikarṣaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1306: hṛdayamaśaraṇaṃ me pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kaṭākṣair apahṛtamapaviddhaṃ pītamunmīlitaṃ ca” //
GK16rajkmimu:1311: “krodhaṃ prabho saṃhara saṃhareti yāvadbhiraḥ rave marutāṃ caranti /
GK16rajkmimu:1315: sā rajjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmālyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna” //
GK16rajkmimu:1321: eko 'rthaḥ saṃskṛtoktyā sa sukaviracanaḥ prākṛtenāparo 'smin anyo 'pabhraṃśagīrbhiḥ kimaparamaparo bhūtabhāṣākrameṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:1322: dvitrābhiḥ ko 'pi vāgbhirbhavati catasṛbhiḥ kiñca kaścidvivektuṃ yasyetthaṃ dhīḥ prapannā snapayati sukavestasya kīrttirjaganti //
GK16rajkmimu:1325: iti rājaśekharakṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ kavirahasye prathame 'dhikaraṇe arthānuśāsane (arthavyātpiḥ) navamo 'dhyāyaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:1329: nāmadhātupārāyaṇe, abhidhānakośaḥ, chandovicitaḥ, alaṅkāratantraṃ ca kāvyavidyāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1340: tridhā ca śaucaṃ vākśaucaṃ, manaḥ-śaucaṃ, kāyaśaucaṃ ca /
GK16rajkmimu:1366: kāvyābhiniveśakhinnasya manasastadvinirvedacchedāya ājñābhūkaparijanaṃ vijanaṃ vā tasya sthānam /
GK16rajkmimu:1368: prākṛtasaṃskṛtabhāṣāvida āntaḥpurikā, mitrāṇi cāsya sarvabhāṣāvindi bhaveyuḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1377: svabhavane hi bhāṣāniyamaṃ yathā prabhurvidadhāti tathā bhavati /
GK16rajkmimu:1378: śrūyate hi magadheṣu śiśunāgo nāma rājā;
GK16rajkmimu:1379: tena duruñcārānaṣṭau varṇānapāsya svāntaḥpura eva pravarttato niyamaḥ,
GK16rajkmimu:1381: śrūyate ca sūraseneṣu kuvindo nāma rājā;
GK16rajkmimu:1383: śrūyate ca kuntaleṣu sātavāhano nāma rājā; tena prākṛtabhāṣātmakamantaḥpura eveti samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:1385: tena ca saṃskṛtabhāṣātmakamantaḥpura eveti samānaṃ pūrveṇa /
GK16rajkmimu:1399: kvāsya vā cetaḥ saṃsajata iti buddhvā bhāṣāviśeṣamāśrayeta“iti ācāryāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1401: svatantraghasya punarekabhāṣāvatsarvā api bhāṣāḥ syuḥ” iti yāyāvarīyaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1404: “gauḍādyāḥ saṃskṛtasthāḥ paricitarucayaḥ prākṛte lāṭadeśyāḥ sāpabhraṃśaprayogāḥ sakalamarubhuvaṣṭakkabhādānakāśca /
GK16rajkmimu:1405: āvantyāḥ pāriyātrāḥ saha daśapurajairbhūtabhāṣāṃ bhajante yo madhyemadhyadeśaṃ nivasati sa kaviḥ sarvabhāṣāniṣaṇṇaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:1411: pratyakṣe tu kavau lokaḥ sāvajñaḥ sumahatyapi //
GK16rajkmimu:1416: vacaḥ svādu satāṃ lehyaṃ leśasvādvapi kautukāt /
GK16rajkmimu:1419: kāvyaṃ sadyaḥ kavīnāṃ ca bhramatyahnā diśo daśa //
GK16rajkmimu:1421: avivicyaiva kāvyāni stuvanti ca paṭhanti ca” //
GK16rajkmimu:1424: sa hi svīyaṃ bruvāṇaḥ katareṇa sākṣiṇā jīyeta /
GK16rajkmimu:1432: kaviṃmanyasya hi purataḥ sūktamaraṇyaruditaṃ syādviplaveta ca /
GK16rajkmimu:1434: “idaṃ hi vaidagdhyarahasyamuttamaṃ paṭhenna sūktiṃ kavimāninaḥ puraḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:1436: aniyatakālāḥ pravṛttayo viplavante tasmāddivasaṃ niśāṃ ca yāmakrameṇa caturddhā vibhajet /
GK16rajkmimu:1438: tato vidyāvasathe yathāsukhamāsīnaḥ kāvyasya vidyā upavidyāścānuśīlayedāpraharāt /
GK16rajkmimu:1445: caturtha ekākinaḥ parimitapariṣado vā pūrvāhnabhāgavihitasya kāvyasya parīkṣā /
GK16rajkmimu:1446: rasāveśataḥ kāvyaṃ viracayato na ca vivektrī dṛṣṭistasmādanuparīkṣeta /
GK16rajkmimu:1460: yaḥkāvyakriyāyāmabhiniviṣṭaḥ kavate na ca nauṣṭhikavṛttiḥ, sa niṣāṇṇastasyāpi ta eva kālāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1461: yaḥ sevādikamavirundhānaḥ kavate, sa dattāvasarastasya katipaye kālāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1466: viṣayāntaravinivṛttaṃ hi cittaṃ yatra yatra praṇidhīyate tatra tatra guhūcīlāgaṃ lagati /
GK16rajkmimu:1467: yadā yadā cātmanaḥ kṣaṇikatāṃ manyate sa sa kāvyakaraṇakālaḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:1474: śrūyante dṛśyante ca rājaputryo mahāmātraduhitaro gaṇikāḥ kautukibhāryāśca śāstraprahatabuddhayaḥ kavayaśca /
GK16rajkmimu:1480: duṣṭe dviṣṭe ca viśvāsaḥ pañca kāvyamahāpadaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1483: suhṛdbhiḥ saha vivecayiṣyāmīti karturākulatā rāṣṭropaplavaśca prabandhavināśakāraṇāni /
GK16rajkmimu:1484: “aharniśāvibhāgena ya itthaṃ kavate kṛtī /ekāvalīva tatkāvyaṃ satāṃ kaṇṭheṣu lambate //
GK16rajkmimu:1492: rītiṃ vicintya vigaṇayya guṇānvigāhya śabdārthasārthamanusṛtya ca sūktimudrāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1493: kāryo nibandhaviṣaye viduṣā prayatnaḥ ke potayantrarahitā jaladhau plavante //
GK16rajkmimu:1494: līḍhābhidhopaniṣadāṃ savidhe budhānām abhyasyataḥ pratidinaṃ bahudṛśvano 'pi /
GK16rajkmimu:1495: kiñcitkadācana kathañcana sūktipākād vāk-tattvamunmiṣati kasyacideva puṃsaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:1498: siddhiḥ sūktiṣu sā tasya jāyate jagaduttarā /

GK16rajkmimu:1501: rājani kavau sarvo lokaḥ kaviḥ syāt /
GK16rajkmimu:1508: bahubhāṣākavitve yo yatrādhikaṃ pravīṇaḥ sa tena vyapadiśyate /
GK16rajkmimu:1509: yastvanekatra pravīṇaḥ sa saṅkramya tatra tatropaviśet /

GK16rajkmimu:1514: tataḥ paraṃ citralepyakṛto māṇikya vandhakā vaikaṭikāḥ svarṇakāravarddhakilohakārā anye 'pi tathāvidhāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1516: tataḥ paraṃ bhujaṅgaṇikāḥ plavakaśaubhikajabhbhakamallāḥ śastropajīvino 'nye 'pi tathāvidhāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1517: tatra yathāsukhamāsīnaḥ kāvyagoṣṭīṃ pravarttayed bhāvayet parīkṣeta ca /
GK16rajkmimu:1519: tuṣṭapuṣṭāścāsya sabhyā bhaveyuḥ sthāne ca pāritoṣikaṃ labheran /
GK16rajkmimu:1520: lokottarasya kāvyasya ca yathārhā pūjā kavarvā /
GK16rajkmimu:1524: deśāntarāgatānāṃ ca vituṣāmanyadvārā saṅgaṃ kārayedaucityādyāvatsthiti pūjāṃ ca /
GK16rajkmimu:1539: vaśastasya jagadvayāpi sa sukhī tatra tatra ca //
GK16rajkmimu:1540: iti rājaśekharakṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ kavirahasye prathame 'dhikaraṇe kavicaryā rājacaryāṃ ca daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GK16rajkmimu:1547: tayoḥ śabdaharaṇameva tāvatpañcadhā padataḥ, pādataḥ, arddhataḥ, vṛttataḥ, prabandhataśca /
GK16rajkmimu:1552: pānthāḥ kesariṇaṃ na paśyata puropyenaṃ vasantaṃ vane mūḍhā rakṣata jīvitāni śaraṇaṃ yāta priyāṃ devatām” //
GK16rajkmimu:1555: sthitaṃ panthānamāvṛtya kiṃ kirātaṃ na paśyasi” //
GK16rajkmimu:1560: “kopānmānini kiṃ sphuratyatitarāṃ śobhādharaste 'dharaḥ kiṃ vā cumbanakāraṇāddayita no vāyorvikārādayam /
GK16rajkmimu:1561: tasmātsubhru sugandhimāhitarasaṃ snigdhaṃ bhajasvādarān mugdhe māṃsarasaṃ bruvantiti tayā gāḍhaṃ samāliṅgitaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1567: daśasu dikṣu ca tena yaśaḥ sitaṃ niravadhīritamākulamāsuram” //
GK16rajkmimu:1574: “varadāya namo haraye patati jano 'yaṃ smarannapi na moharaye /

GK16rajkmimu:1577: cakraṃ dahatāraṃ cakranda hatāraṃ khaṅgena tavājau rājannarinārī /
GK16rajkmimu:1582: api putreṣu pautreṣu vākcauryaṃ ca na śīryati” //
GK16rajkmimu:1596: “sa pātu vo yasya jaṭākalāpe sthitaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ sphuṭahāragauraḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1603: tasyāpi sāmye na kiñcana dṛṣṭaṃ syāt /
GK16rajkmimu:1609: saṃkṣitpamātpāvasaraṃ ca vākyaṃ sevāvidhijñaiḥ purataḥ prabhūṇām” //
GK16rajkmimu:1616: “pāda evānyathātvakaraṇakāraṇaṃ na haraṇam, api tu svīkaraṇam” iti ācāryāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1619: na tyāgināṃ kiñcidasādhyamasti tyāgo hi sarvavyasanāni hanti” //
GK16rajkmimu:1626: “pādaste naravara dakṣiṇe samudre pādo 'nyo himavati hemakūṭalagne /
GK16rajkmimu:1627: ākrāmatyalaghu mahītalaṃ tvayītthaṃ bhūpālāḥ praṇatimapāsya kinnu kuryuḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1629: “itthaṃ te vidhṛtapadadvayasya rājan nāścaryaṃ kathamiva sīvanī na bhinnā” //
GK16rajkmimu:1633: abhyudgate sakaladhāmanidhau tu tasmin nindoḥ sitābhraśakalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1635: “tattāvadeva śaśinaḥ sphiritaṃ mahīyo yāvanna kiñcidapi gauritarā hasanti /
GK16rajkmimu:1636: tābhiḥ punarvihasitānanapaṅkajābhir indoḥ sitābhraśakalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1637: pāda evānyathātvakaraṇaṃ na svīkaraṇaṃ pādonaharaṇaṃ vā /
GK16rajkmimu:1650: “kimiha kimapi dṛṣṭaṃ sthānamasti śrutaṃ vā vrajati dinakaro 'yaṃ yanna nāstaṃ kadācit /
GK16rajkmimu:1657: udayamahimaraśmiryāti śītāṃsurastaṃ hatavidhilalitānāṃ hī vicitro vipākaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:1659: “kimiha kimapi dṛṣṭaṃ sthānamasti śrutaṃ vā ghanakapilajaṭāntarbhrāntagaṅgājalaudhaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:1660: nivasati sa pinākī yatra yāyāṃ tadasmin hatavidhilalitānāṃ hī vicitro vipākaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1662: “yā vyāpāravatī rasān rasayituṃ kācitkavīnāṃ navā dṛṣṭiryā pariniṣṭhitārthaviṣayonmeṣā ca vaipaścitī /
GK16rajkmimu:1663: te dve apyavalambya viśvamaniśaṃ nirvārṇayanto vayaṃ śrāntā naiva labdhamabdhiśayana tvadbhaktitulyaṃ sukham” //
GK16rajkmimu:1665: “śrāntā naiva ca labdhamutpaladṛśāṃ premṇaḥ samānaṃ sukham” //
GK16rajkmimu:1668: pibati madhusugandhīnyānanāni priyāṇāṃ tvayi vinihitabhāraḥ kuntalānāmadhīśaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:1671: vākyasyānyathā vyākhyānamapi na svīkaraṇaṃ haraṇaṃ vā /

GK16rajkmimu:2285: “cāpaṃ puṣpamayaṃ gṛhāṇa makaraḥ ketuḥ samucchrīyatāṃ cetolakṣyabhidaśca pañca viśikhāḥ pāṇau punaḥ santu te /
GK16rajkmimu:2286: dagdhā kāpi tavākṛteḥ pratikṛtiḥ kāmo 'si kiṃ gūhase rupaṃ darśaya nātra śaṅkarabhayaṃ sarve vayaṃ vaiṣṇavāḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:2288: “mīnadhvajastvamasi no na ca ṣuṣpadhanvā keliprakāśa tava manmathatā tathāpi /

GK16rajkmimu:2294: “vandyā viśvasṛjo yugādiguravaḥ svāyambhuvāḥ satpa ye tatrātrirdivi sandadhe nayanajaṃ jyotiḥ sa candro 'bhavat /

GK16rajkmimu:2300: “ayaṃ sa bhuvanatrayaprathitasaṃyamaḥ śaṅkaro bibhartti vapuṣādhunā virahakātaraḥ kāminīm /

GK16rajkmimu:2303: “dhanurmālā maurvī kvaṇadalikulaṃ lakṣyamabalā mano bhedyaṃ śabdaprabhṛti ya ime pañca viśikhāḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2306: “yasyādho 'dhastathoparyupari niravadhi bhrābhyato viśvamaśvair āvṛttālātalīlāṃ racayati rayato maṇḍalaṃ caṇḍadhāmnaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:2307: so 'vyāduttatpakārttasvarasaralaśarasparddhibhirddhāmadaṇḍair uddaṇḍaiḥ prāpayanvaḥ prayuratamatamaḥ stomamastaṃ samastam” //
GK16rajkmimu:2309: “yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yo gaṅgāṃ ca dadhe 'ndhakakṣayakaro yo barhipatrapriyaḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2313: “dormanderitamandareṇa jaladherutthāpitā yā svayaṃ yāṃ bhūtvā kamaṭhaḥ purāṇakakudanyastāmudastabhbhayat /
GK16rajkmimu:2314: tāṃ lakṣyīṃ puruṣottamaḥ punarasau līlāñcitabhrūlatā-nirdeśaiḥ samavīviśatpraṇayināṃ geheṣu doṣṇi kṣitim” //
GK16rajkmimu:2317: “he nāgarāja bahumasya nitambabhāgaṃ bhogena gāḍhamabhiveṣṭaya mandarādreḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:2339: “so 'yaṃ kavīnāṃ samayaḥ kāvye sutpa iva sthitaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:2341: iti rājaśekharakṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ kavirahasye prathame 'dhikaraṇe svargyapātālīyakavisamayasthāpanā ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:2344: deśakālavibhāgaḥ tatra deśavibhāgaḥ deśaṃ kālaṃ ca vibhajamānaḥ kavirnārthadarśanadiśi daridrāti /
GK16rajkmimu:2348: “halamagu balasyaiko 'naḍvānharasya na lāṅgalaṃ kramaparimitā bhūmirviṣṇorna gaurna ca lāṅgalam /
GK16rajkmimu:2349: pravahati kṛṣirnādyāpyeṣāṃ dvitīyagavaṃ vinā jagati sakale nedṛgdṛṣṭaṃ daridrakuṭumbakam” //
GK16rajkmimu:2378: “jambūdvīpaḥ sarvamadhye tataśca plakṣo nāmnā śālmalo 'taḥ kuśo 'taḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2380: “lāvaṇo rasamayaḥ surodakaḥ sārpiṣo dadhijalaḥ payaḥ payāḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2391: “mātāṅgānāmabhāve madamalinamukhaiḥ prātpamāśākarīndraiḥ jāte rantāpahāre diśi diśi tatayo bhānti cintāmaṇīnām /
GK16rajkmimu:2392: chinneṣūdyānavāpītaruṣu viracitāḥ kalpavṛkṣā ripūṇāṃ yasyodañcattrivelāvalayaphalabhujāṃ mānasī siddhirāsīt” //
GK16rajkmimu:2408: tasyottareṇa trayo varṣagirayaḥ, nīlaḥ śvetaḥ śṛṅgavāṃśca /

GK16rajkmimu:2410: dakṣiṇenāpi traya eva niṣadho hemakūṭo himavāṃśca /

GK16rajkmimu:2490: yo gādhipurasya dakṣiṇaḥ sa kālapriyasyottara iti /
GK16rajkmimu:2494: “catasṛṣvapi dikṣu raṇe dviṣataḥ prati yena citracaritena /
GK16rajkmimu:2496: “aindrī, āgneyī, yāmyā, nerṛtī, vāruṇī, vāyavyā kauberī, aiśānī cāṣṭauddiśaḥ” ityeke /
GK16rajkmimu:2498: “ekaṃ jyotirddaśau dve trijagati gaditānyabjajāsyaiścaturbhir bhūtānāṃ pañcamaṃ yānyalamṛtuṣu tathā ṣaṭsu nānāvidhāni /
GK16rajkmimu:2499: yuṣmākaṃ tāni satpatridaśamuninutānyaṣṭadigbhāñji bhānor yānti prāhne navatvaṃ daśa dadhatu śivaṃ dīdhitānāṃ śatāni” //
GK16rajkmimu:2500: “brāhmī nāgīyā ca dve tābhyāṃ saha daśaitāḥ” ityapare /

GK16rajkmimu:2509: “dvitrairvyonmi purāṇamauktikamaṇiccheyaiḥ sthitaṃ tārakair jyotsnāpānabharālasena vapuṣā sutpāścakorāṅganāḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:2510: yāto 'stācalacūlamudūsamadhucchatracchaviścandramāḥ prācī bālabiḍālalocanarucāṃ jātā ca pātraṃ kakup” //
GK16rajkmimu:2519: pūrvāparau toyanidhī vigāhya sthitaḥ pṛthivyā iva mānadaṇḍaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:2521: “yādāṃsi he carata saṃgatagotratantraṃ pūrveṇa candanagireruta paścimena /
GK16rajkmimu:2522: no cennirantaradharādharasetusūtir ākalpameṣa na viraṃsyati vo viyogaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:2529: yasyodyāne kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā varddhito me hastaprāpyaḥ stabakavinato bālamandāravṛkṣaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:2534: tatra deśaparvatanadyādīnāṃ diśāṃ ca yaḥ kramastaṃ tathaiva nibadhnīyāt /
GK16rajkmimu:2547: athaiṣa prācīnaḥ sarati muralīgaṇḍamalinas tarucchāyācakraiḥ stabakita iva dhvāntavisaraḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:2550: kiṃ cedānīṃ yavanataruṇīpāṇḍugaṇḍasthalībhyaḥ kāntiḥ stokaṃ racayati padaṃ nāgavallīcchadeṣu //
GK16rajkmimu:2552: “puṣpaiḥ samprati kañcanārataravaḥ pratyaṅgamāliṅgitāḥ vā līkīdaśanavraṇāruṇataraiḥ patrairaśoko 'rcitaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:2561: na ca kavimārge śyāmakṛṣṇayoḥ pāṇḍugaurayorvā mahānviśeṣa iti kavisamayeṣvavocāma /
GK16rajkmimu:2565: viśeṣastu pūrvadeśe rājaputryādīnā gauraḥ pāṇḍurvā varṇaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:2569: muhuḥ paśyañchṛṇvanrajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:2578: iti rājaśekharakṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ kavirahasye prathame 'dhikaraṇe deśavibhāgaḥ saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:2582: kāṣṭā nimeṣā daśa pañca triṃśacca kāṣṭhāḥ kathitāḥ kaleti /

GK16rajkmimu:2593: varddhamānasomaḥ śuklo, vardhdamānakṛṣṇimā kṛṣṇā iti pitryaṃ māsamānam /

GK16rajkmimu:2617: sandhyānṛttotsavocchoriva madanariponandināndīninādaḥ sorasyāgre sukhaṃ vo vitaratu vinatānandanaḥ syandanasya” //
GK16rajkmimu:2629: ete kastūrikaiṇapraṇayasurabhayo vallabhā bāhlavīnāṃ kaulūtīkelikārāḥ paricayitahimaṃ vāyavo vāntyudīcyāḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:2634: uddāmaṃ dākṣiṇātyo malitamalayajaḥ sārithirmīnaketoḥ prātpaḥ sīmantinīnāṃ madhusamayasuhṛnmānacauraḥ samīraḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:2640: kiṃ cānyanmṛgatṛṣṇiṅkāmbuvasaraiḥ pātrāṇi vītārṇasāṃ sindhūnāmiha sūtrayanti divaseṣvāgāminīṃ sampadam” //
GK16rajkmimu:2643: vāyuḥ kukūlamiva varṣati naiṛrtaśca kārśānavairiva śarairmadanaśca hanti” //

GK16rajkmimu:2658: kadambakaluṣāmbaraḥ kalitaketakīkorakaś calanniculasañcayo harati hanta dharmātyayaḥ //

GK16rajkmimu:2676: kedāra eva kalamāḥ pariṇāmanabhrāḥ prācīnamāmalakamardhati pākanīlam /
GK16rajkmimu:2680: tīkṣṇaṃ ravistapati nīca ivācirāḍhyaḥ śṛṅgaṃ rurustyajati mitramivākṛtajñaḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2696: sudurbhagāmatra nipīḍya śete svastyastu nityaṃ tuhinarttave 'smai //
GK16rajkmimu:2697: vimuktabarhā vimadā mayūrāḥ praruḍhagodhūmayavā ca sīmā /

GK16rajkmimu:2705: yeṣāṃ madhyemandiraṃ talpasampat pārśve dārāḥ sphāratāruṇyatārāḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2713: pāne 'mbhasoḥ surasanīrasayorna bhāti sparśakriyāsu tuhinānalayorna cātra /

GK16rajkmimu:2715: puṣpakriyā marubake jalakelinindā kundānyaśeṣakusumeṣu dhuri sthitāni /

GK16rajkmimu:2724: galitavibhavasyajñevādya dyutirmasṛṇā rave rvirahivanitāvaktraupabhyaṃ bibharttiṃ niśākaraḥ //

GK16rajkmimu:2735: smarīkṛte preyasi bhaktibhājāṃ viśeṣaveṣaḥ svadate vadhūnām //
GK16rajkmimu:2740: yo mādhavīmukuladṛṣṭiṣu veṇibandho yaḥ kokilakalaruteḥ kathane ca lābhaḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2743: siktā na vaktramadhunā bakulaśca caitre citraṃ tathāpi bhavati prasavāvakīrṇāḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:2753: śucau samabhyarthitasaktupāne prage ca sāyaṃ ca vahanti mārgāḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:2761: strajaśca maulau smitacampakānāṃ grīṣme 'pi so 'yaṃ śiśirāvatāraḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:2764: kkathyanta iva toyāni dhmāyanta iva cādrayaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:2765: eṇāḥ sthalīṣu mṛgatṛṣṇikayā hriyante srotastanutvajanitā jalaveṇibandhāḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2767: karabhāḥ śarabhāḥ sarāsabhā madamāyānti bhajanti vikriyām /

GK16rajkmimu:2773: grīṣme cīrīnādavanto vanāntāḥ paṅkābhyaktāḥ sauribhāḥ sebhakolāḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2776: mālāḥ kaṇṭhe pāṭalā mallikānāṃ sadyo grīṣmaṃ hanta hemantayanti //
GK16rajkmimu:2782: “tyutasumanasaḥ kundāḥ puṣpodgameṣvalasā drumā manasi ca giraṃ gṛhṇantīme giranti na kokilāḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2785: “garbhagranthiṣu vīrudhāṃ sumanaso madhye 'ṅkuraṃ pallavā vāñchāmātraparigrahaḥ pikavadhūkaṇṭhodare pañcamaḥ /

GK16rajkmimu:2788: “sāmyaṃ samprati sevate vicakilaṃ ṣāṇmāsikairmauktikaiḥ kāntiṃ karṣati kāñcanārakusumaṃ mājjiṣṭadhautātpaṭāt /
GK16rajkmimu:2789: hūṇīnāṃ kurute madhūkamukulaṃ lāvaṇyaluṇṭākatāṃ lāṭīnābhinibhaṃ cakāsti ca patadvṛntāgrataḥ kesaram” //
GK16rajkmimu:2793: khaṃ vaste kalaviṅkakaṇṭhamalinaṃ kādambinīkambalaṃ carcā pārayatīva dardurakulaṃ kolāhalairunmadam /

GK16rajkmimu:2806: nānāhaṃsopadhānaṃ sapadi jalanidheśvotsasarpāparasya jyotsnāśuklopadhānaṃ śayanamiva śaśī nāgabhogāṅkamabhbhaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:2812: hemantavaktre yadi dṛśyate 'pi na dṛśyate bandhavidhiḥ kavīnām //
GK16rajkmimu:2818: “gṛhe vāhīkayūnāṃ vahati damanako mañjarīkarṇapūrān unmādaḥ pāmarīṇāṃ maruti marubakāmodini vyaktimeti /
GK16rajkmimu:2819: sadyo bhaṅgānusārastrutasarabhiśirāśīkaraḥ sāhakāraḥ sarparannambhaḥśarāve racayati ca raso racakīcandrakāṇi //
GK16rajkmimu:2820: kunde mandastamāle mukulini vikalaḥ kātaraḥ kiṅkirāte raktāśoke saśokaściramativikace campake kuñcitākṣaḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:2821: pānthaḥ khedālaso 'pi śravaṇakaṭuraṭaccakramabhyeti dhunvan sotkaṇṭhaḥ ṣaṭpadānāṃ navamadhupaṭalīlampaṭaṃ karpaṭena” //
GK16rajkmimu:2829: “karṇe smeraṃ śirīṣaṃ śirasi vicakilasraglatāḥ pāṭalinyaḥ kaṇṭhe mārṇālahāro valayitamasitābhbhojanālaṃ kalācyoḥ /
GK16rajkmimu:2830: samodaṃ candanābhbhaḥ stanabhuvi nayane mlānanāñjiṣṭhapṛṣṭhe gātraṃ lolajjalārdraṃ jayati mṛgadṛśāṃ grauṣmiko veṣa eṣaḥ” //
GK16rajkmimu:2833: sa tu sarasajalārdenmīlitaḥ sundarīṇāṃ dinapariṇatijanmā ko 'pi veṣaścakāsti” //
GK16rajkmimu:2842: yatprāci māse kusumaṃ nibaddhaṃ taduttare bālaphalaṃ vidheyam /
GK16rajkmimu:2843: tadagrime prauḍhidharaṃ ca kāryaṃ tadagrime pākapariṣkṛtaṃ ca //
GK16rajkmimu:2844: drumodbhavānāṃ vidhireṣu dṛṣṭo ballīphalānā na mahānanehā /
GK16rajkmimu:2845: teṣāṃ dvimāsāvadhireva kāryaḥ paṣpe phale pākavidhau ca kālaḥ //
GK16rajkmimu:2847: sarvavyājaṃ bahuvyājaṃ nirvyājaṃ ca tathā phalam //
GK16rajkmimu:2855: tathā tathā kāpi bhaved vyutkramo bhūṣāṇāṃ yathā //
GK16rajkmimu:2860: iti rājaśekharakṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ kavirahasye prathame 'dhikaraṇe kālavibhāgo nāma aṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
